skill.ex1_exc.ws_0.name: Rapid Blade
skill.ex1_exc.ws_0.lore.0: Charge toward the nearest enemy, dealing damage to the target and surrounding enemies.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_0.lore.1: After damage is dealt, return to your original position after a set duration.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_1.name: Snow White Steels
skill.ex1_exc.ws_1.lore.0: Deals damage to enemies around you with an area attack.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_1.lore.1: After use, the user gains resistance.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_2.name: Fullmoon Steels
skill.ex1_exc.ws_2.lore.0: Deals damage to enemies around you with an area attack.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_2.lore.1: After use, the user gains speed.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_3.name: Flurry Blossoms Steels
skill.ex1_exc.ws_3.lore.0: Deals damage to enemies around you with an area attack.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_3.lore.1: After use, deploys a barrier that absorbs damage.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_4.name: Overproduction Steel
skill.ex1_exc.ws_4.lore.0: Deals massive damage to the nearest enemy.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_4.lore.1: Additionally, inflicts a Wither effect on the target for a set duration.
